name: Doom 64
description: Brtual Doom 64 Version 1C, running natively in ZDoom
content:
files:
- game: http://libregeek.org/Linux/game-files/brutal-doom-64/bd64gameV1c.pk3
- map: http://libregeek.org/Linux/game-files/brutal-doom-64/bd64mapsV1c.pk3
- music: http://libregeek.org/Linux/game-files/brutal-doom-64/ZD64MUSIC.pk3
- hud: http://files.robloach.net/lutris/wwhud-doom64-v2.pk3
- wad-data: $STEAM:2300:base
game:
  files:
  - ZD64MUSIC.pk3
  - bd64mapsV1c.pk3
  - bd64gameV1c.pk3
  - wwhud-doom64-v2.pk3
  main_file: DOOM2.WAD
installer:
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $game
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $map
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $music
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $hud
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: wad-data
